name: RoboX (itch) (RaduSR)
description:
A fairly simple game with beautiful graphics and an extraordinary selection of music, I started this game a while back after finished my first masterpiece "Round". 

Would you enjoy a full version of this? Please let me know.

WASD and arrow keys for movement, 
LShift for boost. 
E for action
Get the orbs in the glass tray to unlock the next level.
